definition.text: An indicator process instance is a reference to the process definition of an indicator bot, as defined in a data mine.

paragraphs.text: Indicator bot instances usually require two indicator process instances. One of them references the indicator's multi-period-market process definition and the second references the multi-period-daily process definition.
Once the reference is established, the indicator process instance adopts the name of the process definition it references.
You do not start or stop an indicator process instance directly. Instead, you start or stop the corresponding task.
